tweet_text:
@SkyeJethani As True Love Waits faded in the mid 90's, I remember sitting in a mtg w/ other youth pastors in TX as he warned us of the cultural buzzword coming down the pike that could destroy America: TOLERANCE. 

Something just seemed "off" to me.
text_en: As True Love Waits faded in the mid 's, I remember sitting in a mtg w/ other youth pastors in TX as he warned us of the cultural buzzword coming down the pike that could destroy America: TOLERANCE. Something just seemed "off" to me.

tweet_text: @jxshvs Sincerely kentrell isn’t just an album, it’s a cultural reset, a reason to breathe, an escape from this cruel world filled with thieves. It’s art, the first gift you open on xmas, a hug from a loved one, everything you’ve ever wanted, everything you need. thank you NBA Youngboy
